CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The V OC values of the devices are around 0.5 V , suggesting that the addition of the thienyl units does not affect the main chain distortion.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| thienyl units |
| the main chain |

In this paragraph, the "Material Name" entities refer to "thienyl units" and "the main chain". These are the materials being discussed in the context of the V OC values of the devices.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| thienyl units |

After reviewing the paragraph, the only clear "Material Name" entity is "thienyl units". The phrase "the main chain" is not a clear material name in this context, so it has been removed from the table.
